data.title: Fitness Center at Citrus Grandel a 5 Star Hotel Near Pattaya Beach Road
data.meta_description: Health is wealth hence at Citrus Grande Hotel by Compass Hospitality a 5-star hotel near Pattaya beach road, we have a fitness center at our ground floor where you can stay fit and get into shape. So, all you fitness junkies can get your adrenaline juice pumping with our latest Gym and fitness equipment.
data.meta_site_name: Citrus Grande Hotel Pattaya by Compass Hospitality
data.text:
Citrus Grand Hotel Pattaya provides 494 stylish rooms including 8 One-Bedroom Citrus Suites withthe swimming pool as the centerpiece. To cater to families & friends, connecting rooms are also available. For guests looking for more exclusivity & privacy, Club Floor rooms are offered with their own unique benefits & room amenities. For guests looking for more exclusivity & privacy, Club Floor rooms are offered with their own unique benefits & room amenities.
